original: 馮翊東縣人，曹操部屬，史書中或作李恢。與嚴幹同郡縣，且皆為寒門出身而交好。之後李義被曹操徵為幕僚，曹丕登基後，亦頗受器重，位列九卿。
text: Feng Yidong County, Cao Cao's tribe, or Li Hui in history books. And Yan Qian is in the same county, and both are friends from the poor family. Later, Li Yi was recruited by Cao Cao as an assistant. After Cao Pi became the throne, he was also highly regarded and ranked among the Jiuqing.
